content: felted ipod jacket keep your ipod warm with a wooly nubby felted cozy easy to make by crocheting variegated nashua handknits wooly stripes shown at left in lilac blossoms this pattern is worked in a spiral from the base chain in dcs around details hook 9 0 mm m/n yarn 1 skein 88 yards of nashua handknits wooly stripes gauge not important since you will shrink this to fit once completed pattern chain 11 then in second chain from hook double_crochet in each chain across with n hook 9 dcs +1dc counting the chain = 10 dcs in the last double_crochet don t turn work around end of chain adding 2 double_crochet in last chain keep going around base chain and work 9 double_crochet across other side of chain 2 additional double_crochet at end of chain in last st do not join for a total of 23 dcs around when you ve completed 9 row of dcs around taper off by using 3 hdcs then 3 single_crochet then 3 slip_stitch and fasten_off this will seem huge until you felt it shrink it down till it s the right size for you and voila a cozy way to keep your ipod from scratching up
